frontmatter.excerpt: This work proposes a fast and inexpensive system for the recognition of 3 types of blood cells based on convolutional networks. Our DL model is characterized by having reduced inference times, and also ease of deployment in hardware with reduced resources such as a Raspberry Pi.

frontmatter.excerpt: Unimedic is a chatbot capable of responding to different medical queries in real time. It also performs segmentation of medical images (especially brain images) using Deep Learning models, and then provides some recommendations.
